text: Luigi Zanetti (20 September 1921 - 9 November 2008) was an Italian gymnast. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics and the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Padua
title: Luigi Zanetti
